message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6000, you get $4000. This way we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Bob, my offer is now $5500 for me and $4500 for you. Inflation is hurting me, and this is the best I can do. Let's end this here before it gets worse.
Inflation is indeed hurting you, so I think it's only fair I get a bigger share. Let's settle this before it gets even worse for you.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.  Any more rounds and inflation will eat away at the value, hurting both of us.
